body:
That sounds exciting Chris!



Can you please let me know if there is anything interesting we can add? Referring also to this post, if you haven't seen it: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/research-pr...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/research-project-ideas)



Thanks for all the hard work!



Kind regards,

Theodore.
